official_title: A bill entitled: the "Single-line Prohibition Extension Amendment - Motor Carriers of Property".
short_title: Single-line Prohibition Extension Amendment-Motor Carriers of Property

summary.text: Single-line Prohibition Extension Amendment - Motor Carriers of Property - Amends the Interstate Commerce Act to extend until July 1, 1986, the prohibition with respect to discussion among or voting by motor carriers of property on single-line rates.

titles.title: Single-line Prohibition Extension Amendment-Motor Carriers of Property
